game.name: Tropico 5
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, 협동, 크로스 플랫폼 멀티플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, Steam 트레이딩 카드, Steam 창작마당, Steam Cloud, 레벨 에디터 포함, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Return to the remote island nation of Tropico and expand your Dynasty’s reign from the early colonial period to beyond the 21st Century, facing new challenges including advanced trading mechanics, technology and scientific research, as well as cooperative and competitive MULTIPLAYER.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Return to the remote island nation of Tropico and expand your Dynasty’s reign from the early colonial period to beyond the 21st Century, facing new challenges including advanced trading mechanics, technology and scientific research, as well as cooperative and competitive MULTIPLAYER.

reviewHighlights.text: 트로피코 4인가 트로피코 5 부터 섬하나를 여러사람이 같이 통치하는 협동시스템이 있습니다 협동시스템으로 독재정권을 더욱 두텁고 단단히 다질 수 있습니다
